description: Leftover pitta breads that are past their best come into their own here – making a crisp that’s more of a meal.

default: 1 tbsp olive oil or vegetable oil

steps: Open the pitta breads up into two thin halves and cut them into bite-sized strips. Put on a baking tray. Brush the oil over the pitta pieces (or use a spray bottle if you have one). Sprinkle with salt and bake for 10-12 minutes, flipping them halfway through, or until they are golden-brown and crisp.
Allow to cool and store in an airtight container.
title: Pitta chips
